kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
It will be good to hear from Kentico but as I was working through a Kentico Xperience 13 migration I ran into this issue where the marketers were struggling with the loss of ability to manage form values in their autoresponder and email templates. 
To that end I had created the package [XperienceCommunity.FormNotifications](https://www.nuget.org/packages/XperienceCommunity.FormNotifications/). Sean Wright had spoken about how Kentico weren't wanting to force marketers to continue using macros as they could get quite technical. For the purpose of this package it does resolve marcos based on the name of the field.
